description.value:
You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Thrash]. During this Thrash, your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Collateral Thrash] feat applies to all other enemies adjacent to you. You can then throw the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] creature 10 feet, where they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

If the enemy you choose for Collateral Thrash is also adjacent to you, it attempts only one save and takes the damage only once.
